#### How can this manually be tested?
- clone this repo
```
$ git clone https://github.com/Boths1229/quick-credit.git
```
- install all dependencies
```
$ npm i
```
- start Application
```
$ npm start:dev
```
- log on to _localhost:<PORT>_ to interact with endpoint created
